name: Soldier's Benthic Waterbreather of the Afflicted
Candy Corn Cob
description: Cobbled together from delicious candy corn.

name: Watchwork Mining Pick
description:
Used to mine all metals. Unlimited uses.

Has a small chance to reward a watchwork sprocket on each swing in addition to mining results.

name: Superior Rune of the Sunless

bonuses: When you use your elite skill you inflict 1 second of fear and 5 seconds of poison to nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45s)</c>

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Acid Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Scarlet's Champions Mini 3-Pack
description:
Contains 1 of each of these miniatures:
• Mini Toxic Warlock
• Mini Molten Berserker
• Mini Aetherblade Admiral

Each mini can be activated from your inventory to follow you around the world.
Combine these three minis in the Mystic Forge with the Mini Mai Trin from the Black Lion Chest to create a Mini Scarlet Briar.
